lyrics.stanza: More about Jesus would I know, More of His grace to others show; More of His saving fulness see, More of His love who died for me.
More, more about Jesus, More, more about Jesus; More of His saving fulness see, More of His love who died for me.
More about Jesus let me learn, More of His holy will discern; Spirit of God my teacher be, Showing the things of Christ to me.
More about Jesus; in His Word, Holding communion with my Lord; Hearing His voice in every line, Making each faithful saying mine.
